advancements.adventure.activate_impendui: Activate properly mirrored Impenduit Pylons by using a Heart of the Sea on one.
advancements.adventure.deactivate_impend: Deactivate an Impenduit Field by using a Pickaxe to remove any power source.
advancements.adventure.walk_on_impenduit: Walk on an Impenduit Field with Frost Walker
advancements.nether.use_riptide_in_ultra: Use a Riptide Trident in an ultrawarm dimension while touching an Impenduit Field
